response.overview: A trip on a Hurtigruten ship along the Norwegian coast is considered the most beautiful sea voyage in the world. Filmmaker Volker Wischnowski undertook the tour in the most beautiful summer weather in Norway. And captured the landscape and the light in fascinating footage. The result is a documentary about the shipping route that not only shows life on board, but also many of the excursions on offer and other great Norwegian impressions.
response.title: Hurtigruten und Norwegen
